K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-4: des na sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-5: phye ma red kyi dus la bab bo snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-6: rigs kyi bu de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan rnam par bzhag par mngon pa yod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ni tha na ming tsam yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-9: sdug bsngal ba'i ming tsam dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-11: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ming tsam yang med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa'i chos dang bral ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-13: dri nga ba med pa 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-14: 'dus pa re re la'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-15: de'i mjug tu bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med par 'dus par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:439b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'ang chos gzhan mi ston te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-0: @440a *// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'ba' zhig ston par mdzad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-1: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-3: chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-4: chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-5: chos gang yang yang dag pa'i mtha' las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-6: 'dod chags 'dod chags kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-7: zhe sdang zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-8: gti mug gti mug gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-9: gzugs gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-13: rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-14: mig mig gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang; rna ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-18: yid yid kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-19: ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440a-20: dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang phyir mi ldog pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-0: de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @440b pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-1: de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po gser mdog bya ba zhig byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-3: rgyal po gser mdog des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang bcas pa la lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du mchod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-4: bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-9: 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dag lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-10: mi med kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pas kyang rgyal po gser mdog gi bsam pa rig gnas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de la bsnyen bkur bya bar spro bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-13: rgyal po gser mdog gi 'khor gyi khams dpag tshad brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi po zhig byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-14: 'khor gyi khyams der dar gyi lda ldi ni bres /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:440b-15: me tog gis ni bus mo nub pa tsam du khyab par byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-1: gi bar snang la ni mu tig dmar po'i dra ba bres /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-2: snying po'i spos kyi mchog gis ni bdugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-3: 'khor gyi khyams der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bting ba khri'i rkang pa rin po che du mas spras pa zhig bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-4: byang chub sems dpa' re re'i stan yang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba dag bshams so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-5: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de dpag tshad nyis stong na bzhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-7: 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog gis gshegs shul dpag tshad nyis stong legs par brgyan nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-9: lam de'i ngos g-yas g-yon du stegs bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa dag byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-10: lam de'ang pus mo nub pa tsam du me tog gis khebs par byas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-11: steng gi bar snang la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla bre bres so;/
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-12: stegs bu de dag la'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'phang du mda' rgyang gang tsam yod pa dag btsugs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441a-13: rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig nas rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig tu rin po che'i thag gu bres so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-0: rin po che'i shing ljon pa gnyis gnyis kyi bar du rdzing rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba gser gyi bye @441b ma brdal ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-1: bee d'urya'i the ma skas kyi rim pa dang bcas pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-8: de bzhin du rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i bar thams cad du'ang rdzing dag byas te bkod pa de kho na dang 'dri bar bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-9: rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du me tog sil ma thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-10: rin po che'i spos kyi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-16: khar dkrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-19: ba dan thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-20: de ltar rin po che'i shing ljon pa re re'i drung thams cad du mi brgya phrag de snyed de snyed bkod nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-21: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis me tog sil ma 'di dag gis gtor cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-22: tsandan gyi phye ma 'di dag gis gtor cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-23: pog phor 'di dag gis bdugs par gyis shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:441b-24: sil snyan 'di dag kyang dkrol cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-1: dag kyang sgrengs shig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-2: rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du rin po che'i me tog gi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya'ang bkod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-3: lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-4: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de lam 'di nas phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis rin po che'i me tog 'di dag gis gtor cig ces bsgo'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-6: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de gtsug lag khang de nas byung ma thag tu 'khor gyi khyams su gshegs te de'i bar du gtsug lag khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-8: 'di ltar lam dpag tshad nyis stong po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re phan tshun du 'dom re re tsam na 'greng ngo; ;rigs kyi bu /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-10: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de phan tshun du gshegs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-12: sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' re re'i mgo bo'i drang thad kyi steng na dngul gyi gdugs dkar po gser gyi yu ba can /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-13: mu tig dmar po'i dra bas g-yogs pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442a-14: gser gyi dril bu g-yar ka'i dra bas bskor ba /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-0: ma bzung bar @442b nam mkha' la phan tshun du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de dang 'dra'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-2: rin po che'i gdugs de dag la dril bu g-yer ka'i dra ba btags pa gang yin pa de dag rlung gi bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-3: rin po che'i gdugs de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra ji lta bu 'byung ba de 'dra ba ni sil snyan yan lag 'bum dang ldan pa las kyang mi 'byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-5: dril bu g-yer ka de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-6: rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i lo ma de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-7: rin po che'i thag gu de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-8: rin po che'i stegs bu de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-10: glu dbyangs de dag las kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgra 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-11: de na sems can gang dag sbyin pa la mos pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-12: gang dag tshul khrims la mos pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-13: de bzhin du gang dag bzod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-15: bsam gtan la mos pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-16: gang dag shes rab la mos pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi sgra thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-17: de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:442b-22: de bzhin du dbang po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-3: de bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-6: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gi sgra 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-8: sems can rnams ji lta bur mos pa de lta bu'i sgra 'byung zhing thos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-9: chos kyi sgra de thos nas kyang sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de lam de nas phan tshun du gshegs pa na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-12: dbu'i drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la rin po che 'bum phrag du mas spras pa'i lha'i rin po che'i gdugs ma bzung bar 'phags te phan tshun du 'gro'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-13: rin po che'i gdugs de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-14: dril bu g-yer ka de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa byung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-16: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443a-17: bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de'i rin @443b po che'i gdugs de las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-2: de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-6: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i brtsams pa tsam ngas bshad par bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-9: chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-10: mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-11: smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-13: 'gag pa med pa dang; gnas pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-14: dngos po med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-15: chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-16: de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-17: yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-18: ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-19: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-21: rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-22: mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-24: 'gro ba med pa'i phyag rgya dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:443b-26: gnas med pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-0: chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i @444a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-4: nam mkha' la ni phyag rgya brko bar sla ba'ang ma yin la phyag rgyar yang 'dug pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-5: phyag rgya'i 'bur yang gdab tu med do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-11: rten yang med pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-13: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-14: nam mkha'i rnam pa can dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-15: nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-16: nam mkha'i ston par yang dag par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-17: nam mkha' la ni chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-18: ji ltar nam mkha'i chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la'ang gdags su med par gnas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-19: gdags pa tsam du zad par yang dag par shes pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-20: gang chos rnams gdags pa tsam du shes pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang 'gal par mi byed pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-21: gang de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-22: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444a-23: des na de bzhin nyid la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-0: bstan pa 'di bshad @444b pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par brtse ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-3: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par 'khor gyi khyams der gshegs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-4: der byon pa na lha 'bum dag mchod pa'i las bya ba la spro bar gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-8: padma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-9: lha'i me tog manda ra ba'i char yang 'bebs so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-10: sil snyan bye ba phrag 'bum dag kyang dkrol bar byed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-11: rigs kyi bu; 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od de 'khor gyi khyams der bzhugs pa na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-12: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-13: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mchod pa'i las bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-15: bla mar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-16: mchod pa ji lta bu dag gi phyir spro bar gyur ce na /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:444b-17: 'di lta ste; de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:445a-0: byang chub sems dpa' re re'i rgyab na glang po che dkar po rgyan @445a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:445a-1: thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:445a-2: glang po che'i rgyal po de'i sna la'ang 'di lta ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:445a-4: nyi ma bskyab pa'i phyir rin po che'i gdugs gsal zhing blta na sdug pa thogs pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:445a-5: glang po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sna la'ang mu tig sngon po gsal ba'i mu tig gi do shal 'phyang ba dang /

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450a-11: rnam grangs 'di bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de ji srid pa de srid du 'khor ba na 'khor dgos na'ang bdag gis spro ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450a-14: byang chub la mngon par zhen pa spangs la mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go chas spro bar bya'o snyam ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-0: de @450b ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha bgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-4: byang chub sems dpa' gang grong dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-8: rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song na sems can rnams kyi don nus shing lcogs la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-9: 'os yin bzhin du de dgon pa'i phyogs dben pa zhig tu 'dug nas dben pa na spyod cing bsam gtan gyi ro'i dga' ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-10: bde ba la brten cing gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-11: byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa'ang byin par byed la skyo ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-12: sems kyi dmigs pa la'ang mi brten /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-13: nang du yang dag 'jog kyang 'phel bar byed /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-14: bsam gtan gyi ro myong ba'ang med /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-15: mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa'ang yin na byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-19: byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-22: gang zag gang yang med do snyam du de ltar shes nas bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:450b-23: zhi gnas la rnal 'byor du brtson par gnas la /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-0: sems can gzhan phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i 'dzin 'khris zin pa de dag la stong pa nyid @451a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-1: bdag med pa'i tshul de mi brjod mi ston /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-2: brda sprod par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i thabs la mi mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-3: nyes par byed pa'ang ma yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-4: byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par shes shing chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-7: gang zag gang yang med do snyam ste 'di de ltar ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 'di dag lus kyis mngon sum du byas te thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan la sems can phyin ci log tu sems shing dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag kyang phyin ci log gis zin cing dmigs pa'i sems su gyur pa de las rab tu grol bar byas nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-8: de dag la'ang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med do zhes ston cing de dag kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la 'dzud par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-0: de ltar na bcom ldan 'das @451b de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser bzang 'od bshos gsol nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-1: 'khor gyi khyams der 'khor de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bshad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-2: bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can tshad med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-5: bskal pa las lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-6: chos bstan du zin kyang spobs pa'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-7: chos kyi sgo rnams zad par mi 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang de'i brtsams pa tsam bstan pa yin no //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-8: rigs kyi bu; de ltar na rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang thabs gcig tu lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi tham par bkod pa de lta bu dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-10: phu dud du bya ba de lta bus bkur sti byas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:451b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-1: po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-2: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi gtsug lag khang ma bgyis lags sam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-4: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na bzhugs bzhugs lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-9: byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rang rang gi sprul pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na gnas gnas so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la bka' stsal pa /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-12: de ltar lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'das pa'i tha ma'i nyin par rgyal po gser mdog gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bshos gsol /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-14: slar gshegs par rig nas bsam pa 'di lta bu zhig bsams te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-15: ci bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-16: 'on te tshangs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452a-17: 'on te 'khor los bsgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya snyam mo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-0: de nas de'i sems bskyed @452b pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzang 'od des thugs su chud do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas rgyal po dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-2: skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gi mdun du steng gi bar snang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de kho na bzhin du rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus shig sprul te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-3: de steng gi bar snang de la 'dug nas rgyal po gser mdog la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-4: dper na mi ni shes rab 'chal //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-5: byis pa'i rang bzhin gyur pa zhig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-6: rgyal po bsnyen bkur byas nas ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-7: bya dga' chung ngu gsol bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-8: de bzhin la las sangs rgyas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-9: bsam gyis mi khyab mchod byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-10: tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal po'i srid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-11: dma' ba'i gnas la 'dod par byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-12: rgyal por gyur dang brgya byin dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-13: de bzhin tshangs par 'gyur ba rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-14: 'di dag mi rtag brtan ma yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-15: brnyan ma yin te 'jig tshul can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-16: srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-17: byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-18: sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-19: de 'dra'i sems ni bsngags pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-20: rgyal po khyod ni yul 'khor bcas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:452b-21: mchod pa rgya chen byas zin gyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-2: rgya chen sems ni khyod kyis bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-3: dma' ba'i smon lam ma 'debs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-4: de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-5: shes rab bzang po mkhas par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-6: byang chub mchog la 'jug par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-8: sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-9: gang gis stong gsum thams cad kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-10: rin chen bkang ste phul ba pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-11: gang gis thal mo sbyar byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-12: sems kyis byang chub bsngo byas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-13: tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-14: de ni de bas shin tu che //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-15: gang gis sems can thams cad la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-16: bskal pa bye ba brjod med du //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-17: sems can kun la bsnyen byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-18: de yi bcu drug char mi phod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-19: gang zhig thal sbyar byang chub sems bskyed dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-20: phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten don mdzad pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-21: rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs rnams la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-22: bsod nams 'dod pa'i mi 'gas sngon chad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-23: 'khor bar bskal pa bye bar mchod pa bas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-24: mi gang mkhas shing mdzangs pa'i rang bzhin can //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-25: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la yid ches shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-26: byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453a-27: bde gshegs mchod rten la ni me tog 'bul //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-0: 'di ni de bas bsod nams khyad par @453b brjod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-1: byang chub sems kyis me tog 'bul byed la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-2: bsod nams snga ma de ni dper mi rung //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-3: rgya mtsho dang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-4: sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can ji snyed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-5: bskal pa re re la ni sangs rgyas 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-6: bskal pa mang por las gzhan mi byed par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-7: bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' ni thug pa med //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-8: de dag byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-9: bskal pa mtha' yas bar du bshad na yang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-10: cung zad tsam yang yongs su brjod mi 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-11: sa gzhi dag las rdul ni blangs pa bzhin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-12: de ltar rgyal po skyes mchog khyod kyis kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-13: byang chub sems kyi phan yon 'di thos nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-14: myur du blo gros dma' ba kun spongs la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-15: byang chub phyir ni rgya chen sems skyed cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-16: 'jig rten 'dren pa gser gyi mchod sdong 'od //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-17: bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun ldan pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-18: de yis byang chub sems kyi rnam par smin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-19: 'di 'dra zhes ni phan yon 'di dag bstan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-20: byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-21: bsod nams de la gal te gzugs yod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-22: zhing rnams gangg'a'i bye snyed gang byas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-23: de dag bkang bas cha tsam zad pa med; ;rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra thos nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-24: rgyal po'i gtso bo sems ni dga' gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:453b-25: sor mo bcu yis thal mo sbyar byas nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-2: byang chub phyir ni bdag gis sems bskyed do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-3: bdag ni chos rje sangs rgyas grub par shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-4: byang chub rdul bral 'dus ma byas rtogs nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-5: sems can gangg'a'i bye snyed dgrol bar bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-6: sangs rgyas sku des tshigs bcad 'di brjod nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-7: de tshe rgyal po'i gtso bo dga' gyur pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-8: shes nas stong gsum thams cad rab g-yos te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-9: ngang ba'i rgyal po bzhin du mkha' las song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-10: rgyal po gser mdog sems ni dad gyur nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-11: bu dang bu mo de bzhin chung ma dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-12: rgyal po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-13: sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal 'dod zhes pos //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-14: bye ba brgya phrag drug cus yongs bskor zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-15: me tog rnams dang phreng dang bdug pa thogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-16: sangs rgyas ga la bar ni gnyi rgyud song //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-17: zhabs la phyag btsal nas ni phyogs gcig 'dug /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-18: de bzhin bu dang bu mo chung ma dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-19: blon po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-20: rgyal po gzhan dang de bzhin 'khor gyi rnams //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-21: de dag kyang ni phyag btsal gus par 'khod //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-22: lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin bar snang thams cad khyab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-23: sil snyan dkrol zhing me tog char pa phab //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-24: gser gyi mdog de yul gyi mis bskor nas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454a-25: thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas zhu bar byed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-0: @454b stobs bcu ldan pa dpag med lha yi lha //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-1: mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba khyod la zhu //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-2: gang gis byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-3: de yi bsod nams ji tsam bskyed 'gyur lags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-4: bcom ldan ji ltar spyod pa spyad bgyis na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-5: bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal mi mthong par //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-6: nges par bde dang bde blag tshim gyur pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-7: byang chub bdud rtsi mya ngan med pa rtogs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-8: bdag gzhar rkang lag btang yang mi 'tshal zhing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-9: mgo dang rang sha stsal yang mi 'tshal bar //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-10: bdag ni nges par bder gnas spyod pa yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-11: thabs 'dir thub pas bdag la bstan du gsol //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-12: rtag tu bde dang bde blag ldan par shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-13: nam yang bdag lus sdug bsngal ma gyur cig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-14: byams dang bzod dang dul dang sdom pa la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-15: gnas nas bdag gis byang chub mchog reg shog /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-16: le lo ma mchis rtag tu bslab la slob //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-17: bdag gis bslab pa nam yang gzhig mi bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-18: 'dren pa bdag ni dam bcas brtan par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-19: nam yang tshig tsam lhur len yong mi bgyid //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-20: rang byung bsod nams 'bras bu bdag la gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa bde ba gsungs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-22: ji ltar spyad pa'i bslab pa bka' stsal pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-23: thos nas ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par bgyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:454b-24: gser 'od gser bkod 'od bzang des gsungs pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-1: kye sa yi bdag po mnyan par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-2: bde ba'i rgyu yi bsod nams khyod la bshad //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-3: bslab pa'ang bshad kyi de phyir nga las nyon //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-4: gang gis stong gsum rin chen gang byas la //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-5: stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la 'bul byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-6: de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-7: bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:455a-8: gang gis zhing rnams gangg'a'i bye ma snyed //

K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:465b-14: tshong 'dus su song ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:465b-15: de'i ming de la'ang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs des rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:465b-17: byang chub sems dpa' dge slong blo gros brtan po 'di ni srid par 'gro ba'i 'chi 'pho dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:465b-18: skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te mngon par grags par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:465b-19: byang chub thob pa'i tshe'ang 'di'i ming de nyid du 'gyur te 'jig rten du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-0: rin po che bkod pa'i sangs @466a *//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-1: rgyas kyi zhing gi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dus pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-3: de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-5: the tshom za bar srid de /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-6: de tshun chad tshe rabs thams cad du ming /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-8: byams pa zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig tu gyur to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-9: byang chub thob pa'i tshe'ang 'di'i ming /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba de kho nar 'gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-15: des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la byams pa zhes bya'o //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sngon byung ba 'di bshad ma thag pa de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-17: steng gi bar snang la'ang lha'i glu dbyangs grag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-18: me tog gi char yang bab bo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-19: de nas de'i tshe rgyal bo chen po bzhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466a-20: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-0: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa @466b dang; gzhan yang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-1: lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lha'i me tog manda ra ba dag khyer nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ga la ba der gtor to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-5: skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-6: 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-8: mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-10: bde ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-11: 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de snyed kyi don byas pa'i phyir ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-12: sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed pa yin /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-13: sha'i mig gis mngon sum du mthong nas dga' ba thob pa de dag lta ci smos /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-16: de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag pa de'i mod la skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang bcas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-18: mi dang; lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis tshig mthun par /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:466b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-1: sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-3: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-4: dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-5: srog chags stong phrag du ma ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-6: de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i 'khor 'dus pa gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-7: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-8: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-9: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-11: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-13: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-0: de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming byams pa'i dang po sems @467b bskyed pa zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse bas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-2: byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig; de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya bar zungs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-5: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba'i phyir dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-6: gzhan dag la'ang rgyas par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir khyod la gtad do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-9: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas ni gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i dang po 'jug pa 'di thos nas sems kyi rgyud byang chub tu gzhol ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-11: byang chub tu smon pas mos par byed dam /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-16: gzhan dag la rgyas par yang dag par ston par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-17: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-18: mi lus 'thob pa rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-19: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:467b-20: sangs rgyas dad pa rnyed par dka'//
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-2: gnas skabs bzhi po 'di dag ni //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-3: bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ste //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-4: de phyir thob nas ma spangs shig /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-5: mthu rtsal dag kyang chud ma gzan //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-6: mi lus thob pa rnyed pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-7: sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-8: sangs rgyas dad pa'ang rnyed pa dang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-9: byang chub sems ni bskyed gyur na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-10: de phyir brtson 'grus bskyed nas kyang //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-11: rtag tu bag ni yod par gyis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-12: drang srong chen po de dag gis //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-13: bag yod pas ni byang chub brnyes //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-14: sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-15: rtsa ba'i sgo dang tshul gyi lam; ;bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-16: mkhas pa rnams kyang 'di la slobs //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-18: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-19: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-20: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-24: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te; bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-25: 'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-26: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradzny'a warma dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-061-018:468a-29: zhus chen gyi lotstsha ba bande ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa ////
